Articles.Content:
Has anyone had issues refueling? I used to not have any issues but recently...

 

If fuel was coming from 4 tanks to one, I would select all 5 and press in to the receiving and it would take an equal amount from each of the 4 tanks sending. Now, recently, sometimes it is 3 of the 4 selected. Sometimes 2 of the selected.

 

Needless to say the sending tanks are now unbalanced and that causes issue. Am i doing it incorrectly? Could it be mechjeb which is now out of date but still works somewhat?
Could be related to the fuel transfer issues from the New Horizons update. There's a known bug there and they're working on it.
Thank you, sir. That sounds like that is probably the issue.
